steps.text: Locate the Aux. Power Input
steps.subtext: CAUTION: The keys are on a tension-spring cable.

steps.text: Locate BATTERY PACK and tether to TETHER CABLE.
Undo the BATTERY PACK LEADS from the AUX. POWER INPUT.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: Depress the red and black plastic hammers on the side of the AUX. POWER INPUT and pull the leads straight up.

steps.text: Remove BATTERY PACK from AUX. POWER INPUT.
Locate the ON/OFF switch on the back of the BATTERY PACK and switch it to the OFF position.
Place the BATTERY PACK into STORAGE.
In STORAGE, find the replacement BATTERY PACK.
Locate the ON/OFF switch on the back of the BATTERY PACK and switch it to the ON position.
Attach the replacement BATTERY PACK onto the AUX. POWER INPUT by the Velcro.
Insert the BATTERY PACK leads back into same colored ports.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: Depress the red and black plastic hammers on the side of the AUX. POWER INPUT and push leads straight into their ports.

steps.text: Conduct a GENTLE PULL TEST on the wires.
Remove the BATTERY PACK tether from the TETHER CABLE.
steps.subtext: WARNING: All tethers are under spring tension and can retract quickly.

steps.text: In STORAGE, locate the GRAY 220 Volt PLUG.
Install it into the POWER OUT.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: Outlet and plug mate are stiff, ensure the full engagement of the plug into the outlet.

steps.text: Locate the metal BUSS BAR and verify there are BLACK, GREEN & WHITE BUSSES, each with 2 openings.
Insert the WHITE 220 VOLT LEAD into the LEFT WHITE BUSS opening and GENTLY TIGHTEN the thumbscrew.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: DO NOT over tighten the thumbscrew.

steps.text: Insert the GREEN 220 VOLT LEAD into the LEFT GREEN BUS opening.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: DO NOT over tighten the thumbscrew.

steps.text: Insert the BLACK 220 VOLT LEAD into the LEFT BLACK BUS opening
steps.subtext: CAUTION: DO NOT over tighten the thumbscrew.

steps.text: Make sure the METAL LEADS are not sticking out the BACK of the BUSS BAR.
Conduct a Gentle PULL TEST on each cable.
In STORAGE, locate the 110 VOLT PLUG and install it into POWER IN.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: Lift cover with one hand while installing PLUG into the outlet with the other. The lid is spring-loaded.

steps.text: Insert the WHITE 110 VOLT PLUG LEAD into the RIGHT WHITE BUS opening.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: DO NOT over tighten the thumbscrew.

steps.text: Insert the GREEN 110 VOLT PLUG LEAD into the RIGHT GREEN BUS opening.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: DO NOT over tighten the thumbscrew.

steps.text: Insert the BLACK 110 VOLT PLUG LEAD into the RIGHT BLACK BUS opening.
steps.subtext: CAUTION: DO NOT over tighten the thumbscrew.

steps.text: Conduct a Gentle PULL TEST on each cable
In STORAGE, locate the E-STOP KEY.
Insert the KEY into the E-STOP and TURN to the RIGHT and the button will pop up.
Remove the KEY and place it in STORAGE.
Locate the AUX. POWER SWITCH on the POWER IN box and switch it to the “ON” position.
Can you please confirm YES or NO that the SYSTEM GO indicator light is GREEN?

IF GREEN, read this script: EVA 1, this is Houston Mission Control. Congratulations. PHALCON is reporting that they are reading a successful power restoration on their console. You are a go to untether from the TETHER CABLE and return to space station. Mission Control out.

IF NOT GREEN, read this script: EVA 1, this is Houston Mission Control. PHALCON confirms and is not able to report a successful power restoration on their console. EVA-1, please be advised that we have prepared some trouble-shooting steps for you to conduct on a future spacewalk.
